attributes.additional_details:
We are currently campaigning and fundraising to ensure Bodmin (Cornwall) gets Christmas lights this year.

The council seems unable to have managed it and have now suggested that by the time we cut through all the red tape it will be too late!

Like so many others, our high street is in decline. Chain shops won't help and the smaller, independent businesses simply cannot afford to.

This campaign is bringing the community together and we want to reflect this by petitioning for our town council to support lights for 2012 and cut through ANY red tape.
